member.name: T:VL.EllipsisFormat
member.summary: Specifies ellipsis format and alignment.

member.name: F:VL.EllipsisFormat.None
member.summary: Text is not modified.

member.name: F:VL.EllipsisFormat.End
member.summary: Text is trimmed at the end of the string. An ellipsis (...) is drawn in place of remaining text.

member.name: F:VL.EllipsisFormat.Start
member.summary: Text is trimmed at the begining of the string. An ellipsis (...) is drawn in place of remaining text.

member.name: F:VL.EllipsisFormat.Middle
member.summary: Text is trimmed in the middle of the string. An ellipsis (...) is drawn in place of remaining text.

member.name: F:VL.EllipsisFormat.Path
member.summary: Preserve as much as possible of the drive and filename information. Must be combined with alignment information.

member.name: F:VL.EllipsisFormat.Word
member.summary: Text is trimmed at a word boundary. Must be combined with alignment information.

member.name: F:VL.Ellipsis.EllipsisChars
member.summary: String used as a place holder for trimmed text.

member.name: M:VL.Ellipsis.Compact(System.String,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Font,VL.EllipsisFormat)
member.summary: Truncates a text string to fit within a given control width by replacing trimmed text with ellipses.
member.param: String to be trimmed.
text must fit within width.
font is used to measure the text string.
Format and alignment of ellipsis.
member.returns: This function returns text trimmed to the specified witdh.
